io.github.kale_ko.gighm.rendering.shaders

Class ShaderLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.kale_ko.gighm.rendering.shaders.ShaderLoader

  • public class ShaderLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility for loading shader data from a file to use with shaders
    Since:
    1.0.0
